at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.rmcs.data

Class LightControlData

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.rmcs.data.LightControlData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IControlData, IData

    public class LightControlData
extends java.lang.Object
implements IControlData
    Contains one set of values for controlling the RMCSs lights (front / back, winkers).
    Author:
    Boeck

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean backlights
      true, if the back-lights should be on.
      private boolean dynamicLights
      true, if RMCSs lights should be controlled dynamically (through a lightsensor).
      private boolean frontlights
      true, if the front-lights should be on.
      private boolean leftWinker
      true, if the left-winkers should be active.
      private boolean rightWinker
      true, if the right-winkers should be active.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LightControlData

        public LightControlData(boolean frontlights,
                        boolean backlights,
                        boolean dynamicLights,
                        boolean leftWinker,
                        boolean rightWinker)
        Parameters:
        frontlights - true, if the front-lights should be on.
        backlights - true, if the back-lights should be on.
        dynamicLights - true, if RMCSs lights should be controlled dynamically (through a lightsensor).
        leftWinker - true, if the left-winkers should be active.
        rightWinker - true, if the right-winkers should be active.

      • LightControlData

        public LightControlData(boolean[] lightData)
        Parameters:
        lightData - an array of booleans to initialize this data-set in the following order: front-lights, back-lights, dynamic-lights, left-winkers, right-winkers;
